languages.text: Грозноокий Торбальд вызвался изловить и уничтожить мерзкое отродье, но его отряду была уготована слишком важная роль — стая Космических волков должна была первой ворваться в Машинный храм. Посему Магос Доминус Оптикон-22 отобрал когорту элитных скитариев и вознамерился отправиться на охоту за Криком скверны. Солдаты шептались, что он готов был активировать протокол "гарантированной экзекуции" — страшный и исполненный зловещей благодати ритуал, равно смертельный и для врагов Омниссии, и для его верных слуг.

traits.locale_text: Грозноокий Торбальд вызвался изловить и уничтожить мерзкое отродье, но его отряду была уготована слишком важная роль — стая Космических Волков должна была первой ворваться в Машинный храм. Посему Магос Доминус Оптикон-22 отобрал когорту элитных скитариев и вознамерился отправиться на охоту за Криком скверны. Солдаты шептались, что он готов был активировать протокол "гарантированной экзекуции" — страшный и исполненный зловещей благодати ритуал, равно смертельный и для врагов Омниссии, и для его верных слуг.

languages.text: The dire-eyed Thorbald volunteered to track down and destroy the vile spawn, but fate had other things in store for him and his brothers — the Space Wolves pack was to be the first to storm the Machine Cathedral. And thus Magos Dominus Opticon-22 assembled a cohort of elite Skitarii and said that he would locate and eliminate Doomscream. The soldiers were whispering that he was willing to activate the so-called guaranteed annihilation protocol — a terrible and ominous rite that is as lethal to the enemies of the Omnissiah as it is to His faithful servants.
languages.original_text: Грозноокий Торбальд вызвался изловить и уничтожить мерзкое отродье, но его отряду была уготована слишком важная роль — стая Космических волков должна была первой ворваться в Машинный храм. Посему Магос Доминус Оптикон-22 отобрал когорту элитных скитариев и вознамерился отправиться на охоту за Криком скверны. Солдаты шептались, что он готов был активировать протокол "гарантированной экзекуции" — страшный и исполненный зловещей благодати ритуал, равно смертельный и для врагов Омниссии, и для его верных слуг.

traits.locale_text: The dire-eyed Thorbald volunteered to track down and destroy the vile spawn, but fate had other things in store for him and his brothers — the Space Wolves pack was to be the first to storm the Machine Cathedral. And thus Magos Dominus Opticon-22 assembled a troop of elite Skitarii and said that he would locate and eliminate Balescream. The soldiers were whispering that he was willing to activate the so-called guaranteed annihilation protocol — a terrible and ominous rite that is as lethal to the enemies of the Omnissiah as it is to His faithful servants.

The soldiers were whispering that he was willing to activate the so-called guaranteed annihilation protocol — a terrible and ominous rite that is as lethal to the enemies of the Omnissiah as it is to His faithful servants.

The dire-eyed Thorbald volunteered to track down and destroy the vile spawn, but fate had other things in store for him and his brothers — the Space Wolves pack was to be the first to storm the Machine Cathedral. And thus Magos Dominus Opticon-22 assembled a cohort of elite Skitarii and said that he would locate and eliminate Doomscream. The soldiers were whispering that he was willing to activate the so-called guaranteed annihilation protocol — a terrible and ominous rite that is as lethal to the enemies of the Omnissiah as it is to His faithful servants.

languages.text: 凶狠的索巴德亲自提出要找到这只该死的孽种，将它彻底消灭，但命运对他和他的兄弟们却另有安排——进攻机械大教堂时，太空野狼需要打头阵。在这样的情况下，统御贤者奥普蒂孔22号召集了护教军的精锐士兵，说要由他来消灭灾啸。士兵们窃窃私语，说这位贤者打算启动所谓的“确保毁灭协议”。这是一种恐怖而不祥的仪式，无论是欧姆尼塞亚的敌人，还是祂忠实的仆人，都将难逃一死。
languages.original_text: The dire-eyed Thorbald volunteered to track down and destroy the vile spawn, but fate had other things in store for him and his brothers — the Space Wolves pack was to be the first to storm the Machine Cathedral. And thus Magos Dominus Opticon-22 assembled a cohort of elite Skitarii and said that he would locate and eliminate Doomscream. The soldiers were whispering that he was willing to activate the so-called guaranteed annihilation protocol — a terrible and ominous rite that is as lethal to the enemies of the Omnissiah as it is to His faithful servants.

traits.locale_text: 凶狠的索巴德亲自提出要找到这只该死的孽种，将它彻底消灭，但命运对他和他的兄弟们却另有安排——进攻机械大教堂时，太空野狼需要打头阵。在这样的情况下，统御贤者奥普蒂孔22号召集了护教军的精锐士兵，说要由他来消灭灾啸。士兵们窃窃私语，说这位贤者打算启动所谓的“确保毁灭协议”。这是一种恐怖而不祥的仪式，无论是欧姆尼塞亚的敌人，还是祂忠实的仆人，都将难逃一死。

languages.text: Le formidable Thorbald s'est porté volontaire pour traquer et détruire ce monstre, mais le destin en a décidé autrement : la meute des Space Wolves s'est retrouvée à lancer la toute première attaque sur la Cathédrale de la Machine. Ainsi, le magos dominus Opticon-22 a rassemblé une troupe de skitarii d'élite en promettant de retrouver et d'éliminer le Fléau Hurlant. Les soldats murmuraient que le magos était prêt à activer le protocole « d'annihilation garantie », un rite terrifiant qui était aussi mortel pour les ennemis de l'Omnimessie que pour Ses fidèles serviteurs.
languages.original_text: The dire-eyed Thorbald volunteered to track down and destroy the vile spawn, but fate had other things in store for him and his brothers — the Space Wolves pack was to be the first to storm the Machine Cathedral. And thus Magos Dominus Opticon-22 assembled a cohort of elite Skitarii and said that he would locate and eliminate Doomscream. The soldiers were whispering that he was willing to activate the so-called guaranteed annihilation protocol — a terrible and ominous rite that is as lethal to the enemies of the Omnissiah as it is to His faithful servants.

traits.locale_text: Le formidable Thorbald s'est porté volontaire pour traquer et détruire ce monstre, mais le destin en a décidé autrement : la meute des Space Wolves s'est retrouvée à lancer la toute première attaque sur la Cathédrale de la Machine. Ainsi, le magos dominus Opticon-22 a rassemblé une troupe de skitarii d'élite en promettant de retrouver et d'éliminer le Fléau Hurlant. Les soldats murmuraient que le magos était prêt à activer le protocole « d'annihilation garantie », un rite terrifiant qui était aussi mortel pour les ennemis de l'Omnimessie que pour Ses fidèles serviteurs.

languages.text: 獰猛な目をしたトールバルドは卑劣な機械を追跡し、破壊することを志願したが、彼と彼の兄弟には別の運命が定められていた。スペースウルフの群れが機械大聖堂を最初に襲撃することになっていたのだ。そのため、マゴス・ドミヌスのオプティコン-22は精鋭のスキタリ部隊を編成し、ドゥームスクリームの居場所を突き止めて抹殺すると言った。兵士たちは、彼がいわゆる消滅保証プロトコルを発動する意思があると噂していた。万機神の敵にとっても、皇帝の忠実な下僕たちにとっても致命的な、恐ろしく不吉な儀礼だ。
languages.original_text: The dire-eyed Thorbald volunteered to track down and destroy the vile spawn, but fate had other things in store for him and his brothers — the Space Wolves pack was to be the first to storm the Machine Cathedral. And thus Magos Dominus Opticon-22 assembled a cohort of elite Skitarii and said that he would locate and eliminate Doomscream. The soldiers were whispering that he was willing to activate the so-called guaranteed annihilation protocol — a terrible and ominous rite that is as lethal to the enemies of the Omnissiah as it is to His faithful servants.

traits.locale_text: 獰猛な目をしたトールバルドは卑劣な機械を追跡し、破壊することを志願したが、彼と彼の兄弟には別の運命が定められていた。スペースウルフの群れが機械大聖堂を最初に襲撃することになっていたのだ。そのため、マゴス・ドミヌスのオプティコン-22は精鋭のスキタリ部隊を編成し、ドゥームスクリームの居場所を突き止めて抹殺すると言った。兵士たちは、彼がいわゆる消滅保証プロトコルを発動する意思があると噂していた。万機神の敵にとっても、皇帝の忠実な下僕たちにとっても致命的な、恐ろしく不吉な儀礼だ。

languages.text: Thorbald, con una mirada terrible, se presentó voluntario para destruir al aborrecible engendro, pero el destino les tenía reservadas otras cosas a sus hermanos y a él. La jauría de Lobos Espaciales sería la primera fuerza en asaltar la Catedral Máquina. Por eso, el Magos Dominus Opticon-22 reunió a un grupo de Skitarii de élite y afirmó que encontraría y destruiría a Doomscream. Los soldados susurraban, afirmando que estaba dispuesto a activar el protocolo de aniquilación garantizada, un rito ominoso que es tan letal para los enemigos del Omnissiah como para sus fieles sirvientes.
languages.original_text: The dire-eyed Thorbald volunteered to track down and destroy the vile spawn, but fate had other things in store for him and his brothers — the Space Wolves pack was to be the first to storm the Machine Cathedral. And thus Magos Dominus Opticon-22 assembled a cohort of elite Skitarii and said that he would locate and eliminate Doomscream. The soldiers were whispering that he was willing to activate the so-called guaranteed annihilation protocol — a terrible and ominous rite that is as lethal to the enemies of the Omnissiah as it is to His faithful servants.

traits.locale_text: Thorbald, con una mirada terrible, se presentó voluntario para destruir al aborrecible engendro, pero el destino les tenía reservadas otras cosas a sus hermanos y a él. La jauría de Lobos Espaciales sería la primera fuerza en asaltar la Catedral Máquina. Por eso, el Magos Dominus Opticon-22 reunió a un grupo de Skitarii de élite y afirmó que encontraría y destruiría a Balescream. Los soldados susurraban, afirmando que estaba dispuesto a activar el protocolo de aniquilación garantizada, un rito ominoso que es tan letal para los enemigos del Omnissiah como para sus fieles sirvientes.

languages.text: Der düsteräugige Thorbald bot sich an, die schändliche Brut aufzuspüren und zu vernichten, doch das Schicksal hatte für ihn und seine Brüder andere Pläne: Das Rudel der Space Wolves stürmte als erste Einheit in die Maschinenkathedrale. Und so versammelte Magos Dominus Opticon-22 eine Kohorote von Skitarii und sagte, er werde Unheilsschrei lokalisieren und eliminieren. Die Soldaten flüsterten, dass er bereit war, das so genannte Protokoll der garantierten Auslöschung zu aktivieren, ein schreckliches und bedrohliches Ritual, das für die Feinde des Omnissiah ebenso tödlich ist wie für seine treuen Diener.
languages.original_text: The dire-eyed Thorbald volunteered to track down and destroy the vile spawn, but fate had other things in store for him and his brothers — the Space Wolves pack was to be the first to storm the Machine Cathedral. And thus Magos Dominus Opticon-22 assembled a cohort of elite Skitarii and said that he would locate and eliminate Doomscream. The soldiers were whispering that he was willing to activate the so-called guaranteed annihilation protocol — a terrible and ominous rite that is as lethal to the enemies of the Omnissiah as it is to His faithful servants.

traits.locale_text: Der düsteräugige Thorbald bot sich an, die schändliche Brut aufzuspüren und zu vernichten, doch das Schicksal hatte für ihn und seine Brüder andere Pläne: Das Rudel der Space Wolves stürmte als erste Einheit in die Maschinenkathedrale. Und so versammelte Magos Dominus Opticon-22 einen Elitetrupp von Skitarii und sagte, er werde Unheilsschrei lokalisieren und eliminieren. Die Soldaten flüsterten, dass er bereit war, das so genannte Protokoll der garantierten Auslöschung zu aktivieren, ein schreckliches und bedrohliches Ritual, das für die Feinde des Omnissiah ebenso tödlich ist wie für seine treuen Diener.

languages.text: Ulu gözlü Thorbald, bu habis yaratığı takip edip ortadan kaldırmaya gönüllü olsa da kaderin Thorbald ve kardeşleri için farklı planları vardı. Uzay Kurtları, Makine Katedrali'ne hücum eden ilk birlik olacaktı. Bu yüzden Magos Dominus Opticon-22, elit Skitariuslar'dan oluşan bir tabur topladı ve Belanarası'nın konumunu tespit edip onu etkisiz hâle getireceğini söyledi. Askerler; kendi aralarında fısıldaşıyor, Magos'un sözde garanti yok etme protokolünü etkinleştireceğini söylüyorlardı. Bu, Hermesih'in düşmanları için ölümcül, meşum bir ayindi. Ancak Hermesih'in sadık hizmetkârlarıyla kâfirler arasında ayrım gözetmiyordu.
languages.original_text: The dire-eyed Thorbald volunteered to track down and destroy the vile spawn, but fate had other things in store for him and his brothers — the Space Wolves pack was to be the first to storm the Machine Cathedral. And thus Magos Dominus Opticon-22 assembled a cohort of elite Skitarii and said that he would locate and eliminate Doomscream. The soldiers were whispering that he was willing to activate the so-called guaranteed annihilation protocol — a terrible and ominous rite that is as lethal to the enemies of the Omnissiah as it is to His faithful servants.
